promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic strong bear fighting-type pokemon wearing ornate armor. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Armursus, a a dynamic strong bear fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Land Crush, Bone Rush. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "fighting" or "Armursus". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, bear-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This robust creature, Armursus, rules arena-like terrains. With mighty Land Crush and Bone Rush, it defends its turf and playfully trains daily.
